hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="helm" published_version="2.8.1"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
#Install Go sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y tar wget gcc cat /etc/os* cd $WORK_DIR wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln gcc s390x-linux-gnu-gcc go version
# sudo zypper install -y git make mercurial wget
export GOPATH=$WORK_DIR export PATH=$GOPATH/bin:$PATH
#Install glide
cd $GOPATH wget https://github.com/Masterminds/glide/releases/download/v0.13.0/glide-v0.13.0-linux-s390x.tar.gz tar -xzf glide-v0.13.0-linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$GOPATH/linux-s390x:$PATH glide --version
#Download Helm source code mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/k8s.io cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io git clone https://github.com/kubernetes/helm.git cd helm git checkout v2.8.1
#Build Helm cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/helm make bootstrap build export PATH=$GOPATH/src/k8s.io/helm/bin:$PATH
sed -i "s/ -race//g" $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/helm/Makefile
git diff
#Run test cases cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/helm/ make test 2>&1 | tee -a test_logs
cd $GOPATH/src/k8s.io/helm bin/tiller & sleep 20s export HELM_HOST=localhost:44134 helm version
sleep 20s grep -d" " -f "tiller" | sudo xargs kill || true sleep 20s
